name: Neopets - Pok√©mon Theme
description: My third theme. Not entirely happy with the colors because I didn't really plan them in advance. As always, works best with Adblock. The Quicklinks bar is NOT a part of this theme; it's a script called "Neopets Sidebar Quicklinks."
additional_info: If you like my themes, please consider following me on Twitter. I can be found on Neopets as arkurrd. Feel free to send me a NM with theme suggestions!
